topicTitle: So this is what Gash requested

posts.postText: I lol'd at how little effort he put into editing a public shop.

Where have I seen those before? 

Oh right, our servers.
Derp.

Theyre admins abuse like shit.

And when our server is full, they have either 8 players, or none.


Not a problem at all.
The shop we use is an upgraded version of what they have, but heavily modified. The only thing that hasn't been changed  yet  is the UI.
Imho, we should just fade NNJG into the background of thee current UI, and we'd be fine.

>> Imho, we should just fade NNJG into the background of thee current UI, and we'd be fine. 
We're getting a new UI very soon.
